title: Implement real-time performance monitoring dashboard
description: Build a comprehensive monitoring dashboard that tracks system performance metrics in real-time and alerts administrators to potential issues before they impact users
iWant: real-time visibility into system performance and proactive alerts
soThat: I can maintain 99.5% uptime and resolve issues within 2 minutes
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard updates performance metrics every 5 seconds
Alerts trigger when CPU usage exceeds 80% for 1 minute
Response time graphs show 24-hour historical trends
Mobile notifications sent for critical system failures
